Name: Klee
Title: "Fleeing Sunlight" Klee
Desc: Every card you draw may bring an "explosive surprise."
Source: Reward for inviting Klee to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

C113061.Name: Explosive Spark
C113061.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses a $[K51]: </color>Spend 1 less <color=#FF9999FF>$[K303]</color> and deal +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>

K51.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>
K51.Desc: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.

K303.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#1103}Pyro
K303.Desc: Spend the <color=#FF9999FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1103}Pyro</color> Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.\n({SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

13063.Name: Sparks 'n' Splash
13063.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113063]</color> at the opponent's play area.

C113063.Name: Sparks 'n' Splash
C113063.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character to which Sparks 'n' Splash is attached uses a Skill:</color> Deals 2 $[K103] to their team's active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K103.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>
K103.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
